Articles.Content:
When docking with a target, I use to have a reticule showing it's location (when it was close enough) and distance (in the 'not the orbital map' mode, whatever it's called).

In the last month or so, maybe when I upgraded to version 1.10.1.2939, the reticule and distance are missing. Is it a setting I can toggle? How do I get it back? It's very useful when docking.
Try hitting F4, check again, and see what happens.

Thank you sir, that was the answer!

F4 - Toggle Ship Labels - never would have guessed
